Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Reroute at Foster/Kimball
ShortDescription: 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Pulaski, Bryn Mawr and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Kimball.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Pulaski, Bryn Mawr and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Kimball.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near Stony Island/95th Entrance ramp I-90/94
ShortDescription: Southbound 28 Stony Island buses are rrtd via Stony Island, 95th, Cottage Grv, 103rd & Stony Island due to blockage nr Stony Island/95th Entrance ramp I-90/94.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 95th, Cottage Grove, 103rd and Stony Island due to street blockage near Stony Island/95th Entrance ramp I-90/94.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Addison. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Addison.
Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
